description: This kid's balaclava offered in a variety of colours makes any winter activity way more fun! With a super-thick, extra-warm and cozy fleece, this style provides protection against the cold and delivers comfort all day long, whether your child wants to ski, build a snowman, or play in the snow on a freezing day. You can now venture out as a family, knowing your child is protected from the cold, and enjoy the day!
name: The Cozy Fleece Balaclava - Junior
